      public List<String> getAcceptedParticipantIds()
      getter of accepted Participants ids, accepted means the user elected from the lottery in this case not users that accepted invitations
      Returns:
      acceptedParticipantIds the current selected users id for the event from waiting list

    • addParticipantToWaitingList

      public boolean addParticipantToWaitingList(String participantId)
      Adds a participant to the waiting list.
      Parameters:
      participantId - The ID of the participant to add.
      Returns:
      true if the user has been added, false if the user already exist in related list

    • sampleParticipants

      public List<String> sampleParticipants(int sampleSize)
      Samples attendees from the waiting list and moves them to the accepted list.
      Parameters:
      sampleSize - The number of attendees to sample. Should passed max Participant into it
      Returns:
      A list of participant IDs who have been selected.

    • participantSignsUp

      public String participantSignsUp(String participantId)
      Participant confirms their attendance and moves from selected to signed up.
      Parameters:
      participantId - The ID of the participant confirming attendance.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the operation.

    • cancelParticipation

      public boolean cancelParticipation(String participantId)
      Cancels a participant's participation, removing them from any lists they are on. This can be called when the result haven't drawn, in the event page user choose to leave waitinglist or when user wish to decline the invitation
      Parameters:
      participantId - The ID of the participant to cancel.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the cancellation.

    • drawReplacement

      public List<String> drawReplacement(int repalcementSize)
      Draws a replacement from the waiting list when a participant cancels after signing up.
      Parameters:
      repalcementSize - how many replacement the organizer want to draw, should not exceed the current avaliable space
      Returns:
      The ID of the participant who has been moved from waiting to selected, or null if none.

    • loadFromFirebase

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot> loadFromFirebase()
      load the 4 lists data from firebase
      Returns:
      return the 4 lists data, if they are not in firebase yet, create the lists then

    • updateToFirebase

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> updateToFirebase()
      update local date into the firebase
      Returns:
      message to indicate the operation result
